title: If You're Happy and You Know It
short_plot_summary: The song encourages children to express their happiness by clapping their hands, stomping their feet, and joining in other playful gestures.
explanation: A smiling face, representing the happiness expressed in the song
Clapping hands, indicating the action children are asked to perform when they're happy
Footprints, symbolizing the stomping action children can do in the song
Musical notes, showing the song format and the melodious nature of the rhyme
